images.title: Prosperity Bliss
images.caption: Premium scented candle with warm sandalwood and turmeric fragrance
images.description: Handcrafted scented candle inspired by ancient Indian rituals. Blends sandalwood with warm turmeric notes for prosperity and auspiciousness.

images.title: Lotus Serenity
images.caption: Delicate lotus and rose scented candle for meditation
images.description: A meditation on calm living. Lotus and rose combine to create an atmosphere of peace and mindfulness for your wellness routine.

images.title: Incense Dreams
images.caption: Rich incense-inspired candle with cedarwood and vanilla
images.description: Evokes the mystique of Indian temples. A rich blend of incense and cedarwood that transforms any space into a sanctuary.

images.title: Maharaja Gold
images.caption: Luxury decorative candle with gold leaf and premium oud fragrance
images.description: Luxury redefined. Handcrafted with muted gold accents and premium oud fragrance for special occasions and celebrations.

images.title: Chai Nostalgia
images.caption: Warm cardamom and cinnamon spiced candle reminiscent of traditional chai
images.description: Warm and comforting. Reminiscent of traditional Indian chai, perfect for cozy evenings and creating a homely atmosphere.

images.title: Rose Garden Elegance
images.caption: Hand-poured candle with rose, jasmine, and sandalwood fragrance
images.description: A celebration of Indian florals. Hand-poured with premium ingredients and natural dyes for an elegant aesthetic.

images.title: Himalayan Pine
images.caption: Fresh mountain air-inspired candle with pine and eucalyptus
images.description: Fresh mountain air in a candle. Crisp and invigorating for any space. Perfect for promoting focus and vitality.

images.title: Mango Sunset
images.caption: Tropical mango and coconut amber candle for festive occasions
images.description: Tropical sweetness meets Indian warmth. A festive fragrance perfect for every celebration and joyful moment.

images.title: Silk & Saffron
images.caption: Premium saffron candle with silk flower and musk notes
images.description: The essence of Indian luxury. Premium saffron with delicate floral undertones. Limited edition perfect for gifting.

images.title: Midnight Jasmine
images.caption: Enchanting jasmine and vanilla candle for evening relaxation
images.description: Enchanting and mysterious. Perfect for evening relaxation, meditation, and creating intimate moments.

images.title: Brahma Blessings
images.caption: Spiritually-inspired incense and vetiver candle for meditation
images.description: Spiritually inspired. Crafted with intention for healing and positive energy. Ideal for yoga and meditation spaces.

images.title: Festival Gold
images.caption: Premium gold-accented candle perfect for Diwali and celebrations
images.description: Celebrate every festive occasion. Premium handcrafted masterpiece ideal for Diwali, weddings, and special celebrations.

images.title: Handcrafted Heritage
images.caption: Artisan craftsmanship showcasing traditional candle-making
images.description: Each candle is carefully hand-poured by skilled artisans using traditional techniques passed down through generations.

images.title: Natural Ingredients
images.caption: Premium natural ingredients and essential oils used in our candles
images.description: Sourced from the finest natural ingredients and essential oils for authentic, long-lasting fragrance.

images.title: Indian Inspiration
images.caption: Celebrating Indian traditions and modern aesthetics
images.description: Modern tribute to Indian heritage, celebrating tradition while embracing contemporary design and wellness.

images.title: Premium Quality
images.caption: Close-up showcasing the premium finish and attention to detail
images.description: Every element is chosen to ensure an exceptional burning experience and visual appeal.

images.title: Peaceful Moments
images.caption: Create serene ambiance with glowing candlelight
images.description: Transform your space into a sanctuary of calm. Perfect for meditation, yoga, or quiet reflection.

images.title: Festive Celebration
images.caption: Illuminate special moments with warm, dancing candlelight
images.description: Ideal for celebrations, gatherings, and creating memorable moments with loved ones.

images.title: Premium Gift Box
images.caption: Beautifully packaged candle ready for gifting
images.description: Eco-friendly packaging with elegant presentation. Perfect gift for candle lovers and wellness enthusiasts.

images.title: Collection Display
images.caption: Samriddhi candle collection showcasing variety and elegance
images.description: Browse our complete collection of handcrafted candles in various fragrances and styles.

images.title: Hand-Pouring Process
images.caption: Artisan hand-pouring melted wax into candle containers
images.description: Each candle is hand-poured at optimal temperatures to ensure even burn and perfect texture.

images.title: Quality Inspection
images.caption: Carefully inspecting finished candles for quality assurance
images.description: Every candle undergoes rigorous quality checks for color, consistency, and burn performance.

images.title: Ingredient Selection
images.caption: Sourcing premium natural ingredients and essential oils
